live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.

50454.summary: Some customers in the Munroe West and Rossmere area are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50454.title: Jun 10 -  Winnipeg (Munroe West and Rossmere) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
